name: Minesweeper - I My Mine
description:
Master Rank, the highest rank with 999 mines in 68x68
Wanted challenger

*** Features ***
- Auto Save
- Free Pinch-in/Pinch-out
- Change of Detection Time of Long-tap Gesture
- Beginner(9x9), Middle(16x16), Advanced(16x30), High Advanced(24x48), Master(68x68)
- Game Center On/Off
